userProfileFieldName.PasswordSuggestion: New password must be minimum eight characters, at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character
userProfileFieldName.deleteDialogText: Once you delete your profile, you can no longer receive payments or have access to your account.
userProfileFieldName.UsernameSuggestion: Username must be 8-50 characters long, letters (A-Z, a-z), numbers (0-9) and special characters (@,_,-,.,,) are allowed
userProfileFieldName.phoneLength: Phone Number should be of 10 digits
userProfileFieldName.securityAnswerLength: Security Answer should be minimum 6 characters
